oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Main Results
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Willer, Helga
Yussefi, Minou
Sthamer, Dirk
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Country reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this chapter, we present the main results of the 2007 global survey on organic land area, land use and organic farms carried out by SOEL and FiBL
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Bonn, Germany and Research Institute of Organic Agriculture FiBL, Frick, Switzerland
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Willer, Helga; Yussefi, Minou and Sthamer, Dirk (2007) Main Results. In: Willer, Helga and Yussefi, Minou (Eds.) The World of Organic Agriculture - Statistics and Emerging Trends 2007. International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Bonn, Germany and Research Institute of Organic Agriculture FiBL, Frick, Switzerland, chapter 5: The Global Survey on Organic Farming 2007, pp. 23-44.
